name: Asia Ecomm Group
description: Accelerating the growth of Health & Wellness brands by partnering with them to enter, expand and establish in key Asia markets through our 'Tradetech' platform. Through AEG, brands leverage our unique digital ecosystem providing the necessary knowledge, network and finance to scale across key markets. Today, our solution is being utilised by Supplement, Beauty & Skin, Pet Nutrition, and Health Food brands from the US, Europe, Australia, and Asian countries looking to access the broader Asian region using a network of Partners providing access to both Online and Offline channels
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Accelerating Brand Growth in Asia!
ShortDescription: We accelerate Health & Wellness brands in key Asian markets through our 'Tradetech' platform
